The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 14 February is 3,538,194 (6,286 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 09 February, there were 94,289 new confirmed cases (167.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 02 February, there were 131,522 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 28% (37,233 fewer cases).
